oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gridiron restaurant (4)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Union Avenue; Second Street; restaurants; streets; downtown; Peabody Hotel;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photo of the Gridiron Restaurant at the corner of Union and Second. The Peabody Hotel is directly across Second.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lanier, Robert
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Robert Lanier; Manuscript collection processed by Victoria Grey;
